mapper.insert: insert into t_department (roleID, roleName, priority, parentId, parentIds, delFlag, lastSubTime, subBy) values (#{roleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rolename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delflag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lastsubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_department set roleName = #{rolename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, parentIds = #{parentids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delFlag = #{delflag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, lastSubTime = #{lastsubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, subBy = #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER} where roleID = #{roleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select roleID, roleName, priority, parentId, parentIds, delFlag, lastSubTime, subBy from t_department
